articles.title: Manchester United Captain Harry Maguire features in England's 1-0 loss to Hungary - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Manchester United Defender and Captain Harry Maguire played the full 90 minutes as England lost 1-0 to Hungary in the UEFA nations League. The side from eastern Europe narrowly beat England in a closely contested game at the Puskas Arena.
